question: A boatman rows 1 km in 5 minutes, along the stream and 6 km in 1 hour against the stream. The speed of the strean is :
explanation:
Speed of current = $latex \\frac{Rate Downstream - Rate Upstream }{2}&s=1$
$latex =>\\frac{1}{2}\\left ( 12-6 \\right )&s=1$
$latex =>\\frac{1}{2}\\times 6=3 km/hr&s=1$
Hence option [D] is the right answer.
